channel.title: Error, please help
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 4124 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:121) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:35) - Joshscape - .. Online! You can now log in![/code]
Umm, all i did was change items in shops around and bam, this shows up :|

item.title: Error, please help

im trying to find out what that error means. its obvious i should change them back to their “origianl state” But i want to fix my problem… not let it occur again…
